messages.title: Our pledges to you
messages.content:
Fit for purpose health and social care services: We will fight for properly funded, high quality health and social care services in Worthing West.
Properly funded education: Proper medical professionals. Protect the quality of our local services with our proven track record on health. Deliver fair funding to the Tories with more money from central government for education in Worthing West. Decent and affordable housing: Fight for local people to get the Housing chance they need - controlled on a local level. Efficient transport links: Provide more accessible public transport, improve cycle routes, and fix our road network. A thriving Worthing West: Build a just society. Givign people the opportunities they deserve.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives are cutting health budgets for programs and hospitals. Our health service must be properly funded to provide good quality care from cradle to grave.
The Conservatives are undermining our schools through underfunding and pressuring teachers. We must invest in schools and listen to teachers and parents.
We need to make sure our transport options, including cycle lanes and road networks, are fit for purpose.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Time for a change in Worthing West

issues.education: The Conservatives are undermining our schools through underfunding and pressure on teachers. We must listen to teachers and parents.
issues.health: The Conservatives are cutting health budgets for programs and hospitals. Our health service must be properly funded to provide good quality care from cradle to grave.
issues.transport: We need to make sure our transport options, including cycle lanes and road networks, are fit for purpose.

community.content: Time for Believes in the change in Worthing West: labor must continue, giving people the opportunity to show their talent and development

leaflet.personalStatement: I am Dr Rebecca Cooper and I live with my husband and two little boys in West Worthing. I am a medical doctor by profession, and these days I work in public health, trying to keep people healthy and out of hospital for as long as possible...

endorsements.endorsement: Beccy represents the changing tide of our wonderful area. As new people move in bringing zest and creativity to Worthing, we need someone who will harness all our energies and look after those who continue to enjoy the best place in England.

quotes.text: Beccy represents the changing tide of our wonderful area. As new people move in bringing zest and creativity to Worthing, we need someone who will harness all our energies and look after those who continue to enjoy the best place in England.

images.caption: Dr Rebecca Cooper Labour candidate for Worthing West

examples: Our health service must be properly funded, so we can support healthy lifestyles and provide good quality care from cradle to grave.
As new people move in bringing zest and creativity to Worthing, we need someone who will harness all our energies and look after those who continue to enjoy the best place in England.
Before you throw this leaflet in the recycling, give me two minutes to try and persuade you to use your vote for change on June 8th.
A thriving Worthing West: Build a just society.
The Conservatives are cutting health budgets for programs and hospitals.
The Conservatives are undermining our schools through underfunding and pressuring teachers.

personalStories.story: I am Dr Rebecca Cooper and I live with my husband and two little boys in West Worthing. I am a medical doctor by profession, and these days I work in public health, trying to keep people healthy and out of hospital for as long as possible...

examples: Beccy represents the changing tide of our wonderful area. As new people move in bringing zest and creativity to Worthing, we need someone who will harness all our energies and look after those who continue to enjoy the best place in England.
We must listen to teachers and parents. The local organization Save Our Schools, is raising these issues and I am proud to be supporting them.
The Conservatives are cutting health budgets for programs and hospitals.
